thread.title: Betty Bradley
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Betty Bradley

author: Betty Bradley
title: Betty Bradley
text: I REQUESTED SERVICE FOR MY DISHWASHER ON A LATE SUNDAY EVENING BY INTERNET, ABOUT 15 MIN LATER I GOT A CALL AND WAS TOLD WHO MY SERVICE PROVIDER WOULD BE . BY THE TIME I FINISH THE EMAIL ABOUT MY SERVICE REQUEST THE SERVICE CONTRACTOR CALLED AND MADE AN APPOINTMENT FOR THE NEXT DAY 8:30 AM FAST SERVICE AND VERY FAST RESULTS PROBLEM SOLVED. THANKS CHOICE HOME
